title: 610. Grading Athleticism for Every Starting QB In the NFL
itunes:title: 610. Grading Athleticism for Every Starting QB In the NFL
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys give their takeaways from the MNF game between the Patriots and Jets (1:18). After that, the pair talk about how the Jaguars can rebuild and also look at the team's remaining schedule (13:44). Next, the duo discuss the necessary threshold of athleticism a QB must have, while concentrating on some of the top college QBs (16:57). Then, the guys give an athleticism grade for all the starting QBs in the league (20:46). To wrap up the show, the duo compare Bills QB Josh Allen and North Dakota State QB Trey Lance's traits (35:52).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
